content.text:
# List of presidents of Iraq__disambig_1

This is a list of presidents of Iraq since the formation of the First Republic of Iraq in 1958.
List of officeholders
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center"
! rowspan="2" |
! rowspan="2" | Portrait
! rowspan="2" | Name
! rowspan="2" | Elected
! colspan="3" | Term of office
! rowspan="2" | Political party

! Left office

Timeline
DateFormat = dd/mm/yyyy
Period     = from:1958 till:$today
TimeAxis   = orientation:horizontal
Colors     =
id:military  value:rgb(0.76,0.69,0.57) legend:None_(Military)
id:socialist value:rgb(0.94,0,0.11)    legend:Arab_Socialist_Union
id:baath     value:rgb(0.09,0.40,0.29) legend:Arab_Socialist_Ba'ath_Party_(Iraq_Region)
id:ti        value:Blue                legend:The_Iraqis
id:puk       value:rgb(0,0.65,0.31)    legend:Patriotic_Union_of_Kurdistan
id:gray1  value:gray(0.85)
id:gray2  value:gray(0.95)
ScaleMajor = gridcolor:gray1 unit:year increment:10 start:1960
ScaleMinor = gridcolor:gray2 unit:year increment:1  start:1958
Legend     = columns:2 left:200 top:60 columnwidth:230
TextData =
pos:(20,65) textcolor:black fontsize:M
text:"Political parties:"
BarData =
bar:MuhammadNajibar-Ruba'i
bar:AbdulSalamArif
bar:Abdul-Rahmanal-Bazzaz
bar:AbdulRahmanArif
bar:AhmedHassanal-Bakr
bar:SaddamHussein
bar:al-Yawer
bar:JalalTalabani
bar:FuadMasum
bar:BarhamSalih
bar:AbdulLatifRashid
PlotData =
width:5 align:left fontsize:S shift:(5,-4) anchor:till
bar:MuhammadNajibar-Ruba'i
from: 14/07/1958 till: 08/02/1963 color:military  text:"Muhammad Najib ar-Ruba'i"
bar:AbdulSalamArif
from: 08/02/1963 till: 13/04/1966 color:socialist text:"Abdul Salam Arif"
bar:Abdul-Rahmanal-Bazzaz
from: 13/04/1966 till: 16/04/1966 color:socialist text:"Abdul-Rahman al-Bazzaz"
bar:AbdulRahmanArif
from: 16/04/1966 till: 17/07/1968 color:socialist text:"Abdul Rahman Arif"
bar:AhmedHassanal-Bakr
from: 17/07/1968 till: 16/07/1979 color:baath     text:"Ahmed Hassan al-Bakr"
bar:SaddamHussein
from: 16/07/1979 till: 09/04/2003 color:baath     text:"Saddam Hussein"
bar:al-Yawer
from: 28/06/2004 till: 07/04/2005 color:ti        text:"Ghazi Mashal Ajil al-Yawer"
bar:JalalTalabani
from: 07/04/2005 till: 24/07/2014 color:puk       text:"Jalal Talabani"
bar:FuadMasum
from: 24/07/2014 till: 02/10/2018 color:puk       text:"Fuad Masum"
bar:BarhamSalih
from: 02/10/2018 till: 17/10/2022 color:puk       text:"Barham Salih"
bar:AbdulLatifRashid
from: 17/10/2022 till: $today     color:puk       text:"Abdul Latif Rashid"
}}
